page.title: 04Woodland Nurseries
page.content:
Woodland nurseries are situated to the West of Lostock Hall. The present owner built it up over the past 3 years into highly profitable business selling strawberries and other salad in the summer.
Also it has a large market for selling pot plants both to the trade and the public. Over the past two years it has increased the stock and variety of house plants to over 50 different varieties. Fuschias are their speciality and most popular selling plant for hanging basket or tubs. Prices are kept to a maxm of $2.50 for any item. Light is very important as is heating, watering is done twice a day, early and late. There are 15000 plants in stock. The nursery is open 7 days a week
